definition: a pitch thrown deliberately close to the batter
details:
noun
- a pitch thrown deliberately close to the batter
- a piece of cloth used for dusting
= synonyms: dustcloth, dustrag
- a loose coverall (coat or frock) reaching down to the ankles
= synonyms: gaberdine, gabardine, smock, dust coat
- a windstorm that lifts up clouds of dust or sand
= example: a windstorm that lifts up clouds of dust or sand
= synonyms: dust storm, sandstorm, sirocco
